body.p: There are several server-side setup needs for P4:

dd.p: Oracc's Apache config uses a redirect to supply / when the URL ends with a project name, like https://oracc.museum.upenn.edu/rimanum. To support P4's use of the QUERY_STRING this needs to be conditionalized:
The web-request handler wx must be in the cgi-bin directory and CGI needs to be enabled in the Apache config:
dd.pre: <Directory "/home/oracc/www/cgi-bin"> AllowOverride None Options ExecCGI Require all granted </Directory>

dd.p: P4 uses two working directories: /home/oracc/www/htm and /home/oracc/www/is.d. The htm has been in use on Oracc for some years, but is.d is new. Both directories need to have www-data:oracc ownership and drwxr-s--x permissions.
